{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Amped Wireless |model=R20000G |revision= |upc=850214003195 |ean= |asin=B007M8SGW2 |price= |est_release_date=05/14/2012 |fcc_date=07/31/2012 |manuf_country=Taiwan |manuf=Loopcomm |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=ZTT-R20000G |ic_id=10233A-R20000G |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8198 |cpu1_cspeed=620 |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1= |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8192DR |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi2_chip1_model=RTL8192CE |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid=Amped_2.4GHz,Amped_5.0GHz |default_ssid_regex=^Amped_2.4GHz$,,,^Amped_5.0GHz$ |default_ip=192.168.3.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= }} ''High Power Wireless-N 600mW Gigabit Dual Band Router''
[http://www.ampedwireless.com/products/r20000g.html Product page] [http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-news/31750-amped-wireless-adds-simultaneous-dual-band-router '''''Amped Wireless Adds Simultaneous Dual-Band Router''''' - '''SmallNetBuilder'''] The device uses 2x [http://www.skyworksinc.com/uploads/documents/SE5004L_DS.pdf '''Skyworks''' ('''SiGe''') SE5004L / 5004L power amplifiers] for the 5GHz radio and 2x [http://www.skyworksinc.com/uploads/documents/SE2576L_DS.pdf '''Skyworks''' ('''SiGe''') SE2576L / 2576L power amplifiers] for the 2.4GHz radio. This device likely has 8 MB Flash and 64 MB of RAM (like the [[Amped Wireless AP20000G]]). Per the manual, the default SSIDs are '''Amped_2.4GHz''' and '''Amped_5.0GHz'''. The default WPA PSK is '''wireless'''. Probable F8:7B:8C OUIs ==Images== [[File:R20000G.png]][[Has images::external| ]]
